name: Marco Pöhler
title: Freelancer & Geschäftsführer
bio: Software-Developer with strong online marketing focus. Created some successful price comparison websites which enables him to spend most of his time exploring new web technologies or repairing his old car (A Dodge Charger from 1972).

name: Matthias Friedrich
title: Android Developer
bio: As Android user from the beginning, he started to develop for the platform with version 1.6 in 2009. Since then he is following its progress very enthusiastically and worked on several applications, big and small, successful in the Play Store and as specialized customer solutions . During these years, he also co-founded the GDG Bremen and GDG Hamburg Android, gave several Android related talks and organized developer events around Google technologies in general.

name: Serj Lotutovici
title: Android Developer
bio: Serj is an Android Developer at XING. He is responsible for the framework part that drives the XING Main App, along side other mobile products. He is known for his passion for clean and sustainable code. DI is his middle name, Jenkins is his best friend and he eats Gradle for lunch. You will never hear him showing-of a feature, but he will not miss an opportunity to tell you about 'this cool new library' or 'this awesome design pattern'.

name: Ingo Oeser
title: Developer
bio: Night owl who loves reading lots of code, science fiction and fantasy. Writing Go code for fun and profit.
